message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $750,000 is a good starting point, I'm not able to accept that offer just yet.  I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  This still allows me to achieve a fair profit while also giving you a good price.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $900,000 is still a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $850,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
